column1: Smoque BBQ////I find it remarkable that the service doesn't collapse during the dinner rush
column2: if I had to guess I would attribute that composure to the leadership of the owner who you will typically find standing guard sporting some nifty Zuba-esque chef pants
column3: and ushering patrons to tables. Â The small dining room
column5: and counter service seems to be a disaster waiting to happen
column6: but even with the line out the door
column7: we have typically been seated at a table with our food within 15 minutes of arrival. Now that is now you do BBQ
